chain.network.label: Blockchain Network
chain.network.help: EVM chain to anchor audit records. Default: Base (L2).

chain.rpcUrl.label: RPC URL
chain.rpcUrl.help: JSON-RPC endpoint for the selected chain

chain.privateKey.label: Signer Private Key
chain.privateKey.help: Private key used to sign anchor transactions (hex, with 0x prefix)

storage.provider.label: Decentralized Storage Provider
storage.provider.help: Where to archive encrypted session data

storage.gateway.label: IPFS/Arweave Gateway URL
storage.gateway.help: HTTP gateway for retrieving archived content

storage.pinataJwt.label: Pinata JWT (for IPFS pinning)
storage.pinataJwt.help: JWT token for Pinata IPFS pinning service

privacy.onChainData.label: On-chain Data Policy
privacy.onChainData.help: What to write on-chain: hash_only (default) | hash_and_meta | encrypted_content

privacy.archiveEncryption.label: Archive Encryption
privacy.archiveEncryption.help: Encrypt content before uploading to decentralized storage (default: true)

identity.domain.label: SIWE Domain
identity.domain.help: Domain used for SIWE verification (default: openclaw.ai)

identity.uri.label: SIWE URI
identity.uri.help: URI used in SIWE messages (default: https://openclaw.ai)

identity.statement.label: SIWE Statement
identity.statement.help: User-facing statement shown in SIWE messages

identity.challengeTtlMs.label: SIWE Challenge TTL (ms)
identity.challengeTtlMs.help: How long a SIWE challenge stays valid before expiring

billing.enabled.label: Enable Billing
billing.enabled.help: Track usage and enforce quota limits

billing.quotaPerSession.label: Quota per Session (credits)
billing.quotaPerSession.help: Maximum credits per session before requiring top-up

browserIngest.enabled.label: Enable Browser Ingest
browserIngest.enabled.help: Allow browser extension events to be posted into the Gateway

browserIngest.ingestPath.label: Browser Ingest Path
browserIngest.ingestPath.help: HTTP path for extension -> Gateway ingest

browserIngest.token.label: Browser Ingest Token
browserIngest.token.help: Shared secret required by the browser extension

browserIngest.allowLoopback.label: Allow Loopback Without Token
browserIngest.allowLoopback.help: Permit localhost requests when no token is configured

browserIngest.maxBodyBytes.label: Max Ingest Payload (bytes)
browserIngest.maxBodyBytes.help: Maximum payload size accepted from the browser extension
